original:
Moscow, Russia – The Russian government has announced its preference for domestic companies to lead major energy deals worth billions of dollars, sidelining Western majors.
The move comes amid growing economic uncertainties and mounting pressure from the West over sanctions and allegations of involvement in recent cyberattacks.
"The priority for participation in energy projects will be given to Ru
